hero.title: AI & Backend Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building robust, scalable systems that translate complex data into business impact.
focusPoints: My focus is on cloud architecture, AI pipelines, and crafting high-performance developer tools.
Partnering with leaders to translate complex data into resilient platforms that drive measurable outcomes.

infoPanel.headline: Designing resilient systems
infoPanel.body: Focused on building AI-powered platforms and operational tooling that scale from prototype to production without sacrificing developer velocity.

projects.title: AI Document Management Platform
projects.result: RESULT → 95% reduction in manual data entry
projects.description: A RAG pipeline to create an intelligent, searchable knowledge base from user documents.

principles.title: Scale Through Simplicity
principles.description: The most scalable systems follow simple patterns applied consistently. Complex architectures often collapse under their own weight—elegant ones adapt and grow.
